protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: This is a receptor for the tachykinin neuropeptide substance P. It is probably associated with G proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system. The rank order of affinity of this receptor to tachykinins is:substance P > substance K > neuromedin-K

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
